Demand Letters.prompt: generate an official demand letter using the following information:

questions.name: the issue or problem that needs to be resolved
questions.label: Describe the issue or problem that needs to be resolved

questions.name: time frame to take action before
questions.label: Recepient is required to take action before

questions.name: legal actions you plan to take
questions.label: Describe the legal actions you plan to take

Cease and Desist Letters.prompt: generate a cease and desist letter using the following information:

questions.name: Description of the infringing activity
questions.label: Describe the activity that the recipient is engaging in that you want them to stop

questions.name: Deadline to respond or take action
questions.label: Deadline to respond or take action

questions.name: Consequences if the infringing activity continues
questions.label: Consequences if the infringing activity continues

Complaints.prompt: generate a complaint using the following information:

questions.name: list of the specific problems that led to dissatisfaction
questions.label: List your reasons for complaint

questions.name: list of the specific actions that sender would like to see taken
questions.label: Describe specific action you would like to see taken

Powers of Attorney.prompt: generate a power of attorney letter using the following information:

questions.name: limitations on agent's powers or Specific instructions from the principal
questions.label: Limitations on the agent's powers or Specific instructions from the principal

questions.name: The date the power of attorney is being granted
questions.label: The date the power of attorney is being granted

Landlord-Tenant Agreements.prompt: generate a landlord-tenant agreement letter using the following information:

questions.name: Terms of the lease
questions.label: Terms of the lease (e.g. pets allowed/not allowed, smoking allowed/not allowed, etc.)

questions.name: Any additional terms or conditions that need to be included in the agreement (skip if null)
questions.label: Any additional terms or conditions that need to be included in the agreement

Contracts.prompt: generate a contract letter using the following information:

questions.name: Description of the service or product to be provided
questions.label: Description of the service or product to be provided

questions.name: Reference to any contract or proposal (skip if null)
questions.label: Reference to any contract or proposal

questions.name: Number of days/weeks/months required for written notice of termination
questions.label: Number of days/weeks/months required for written notice of termination

questions.name: Reference to governing law and dispute resolution procedures (skip if null)
questions.label: Reference to governing law and dispute resolution procedures (if any)

Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA).prompt: generate a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) letter using the following information:

questions.name: The scope of the confidential information that will be shared
questions.label: The scope of the confidential information that will be shared

questions.name: The purpose of the disclosure of the confidential information for the receiving party
questions.label: The purpose of the disclosure of the confidential information for the receiving party

questions.name: The consequences of a breach of the NDA
questions.label: The consequences of a breach of the NDA

questions.name: The state whose laws will govern the agreement
questions.label: The state whose laws will govern the agreement

questions.name: Any additional terms or clauses that the parties wish to include in the agreement
questions.label: Any additional terms or clauses that the parties wish to include in the agreement
